entries.question: Who directed the work of writing these messages from God?
entries.authorNote:
The 
"holy men
" mentioned here was the Hebrew race--the trace chosen by God to be His special representatives in the world. No people in the world today wrote any part of the Bible; they have only helped in translation of the sacred Book from the original languages, and were assisted by the nationals of many tribes and nations.

entries.question: HOW DID THE BIBLE COME TO MEN?
How did men assist in this work of revelation?
entries.authorNote: They were instruments to convey God's messages to the people
